description: Classify spaceflight phase from plasma protein expression profiles. 4 crew x 5-6 timepoints, 2,845 proteins. Compare with A1 (clinical features) to assess if proteomics adds value.

input_spec.note: PCA reduction recommended due to p>>n (2,845 features, 21 samples)

notes: N=21, extreme p>>n â€” baseline uses PCA(k=10) for dimensionality reduction
Compare with A1 (39 clinical features) and G1 (multi-modal)
